name: Conquering Kitchen
description:
Use Left/Right Arrow or A/D to move the bacteria.
Press Left Shift to change currently controlled bacteria.
Press W or Space to jump (only suitable for Jumperia).

Make use of three different bacteria to infect the food in a kitchen. Watch out to not fall off the shelf and not touch the anti-bacterial liquid! (unless you are high on acid)

Characters Jumperia

This bacteria is so happy, that it can bounce from the surface. If other bacteria touch Jumperia, they gain her energy and get thrown in the air.

(Set up at the correct positions to reach higher shelves.)Acidec

While it's still just a young bacteria, it is very dangerous. No anti-bacterial liquid will be able to fight its' acid. Useful to make paths for other bacteria.
(Walk over  to prevent other bacteria from dying on contact.)              Dr Dose

Highly-qualified bacteria, which is the only one that can inject bacteria into the food. It is also the only bacteria capable of picking Bacterians.
(Walk over to score more points, get toto win.) Time Distribution Zbordek:

Graphics: ~40 minutes
Coding: 94 minutes
Setting the Level: 20 minutes
Bug-Fixing: 20 minutes

filipscomposer:

Background Music: 1 hour
Sound Effects: 2 hours

_____
Both of us used a lot of time to think and get ideas before jumping into work, just so we knew what we wanted to do.

We met each other on the forum of this game jam. We got in touch via Discord then and after hours of chatting in English, it turned out that... we are both Polish! :)

In terms of the development of the game, the biggest challenge was well-designing the game. Because this time does not count towards the 3-hour limit, planning everything well made us able to come up with a pretty fruitful product. 

We had more levels designed, however, because of the time limit, we needed to cut it into only one level. We extended it a bit from what we initially planned, so sorry if the game is too hard! 

For anyone stuck/willing to make the game easier for themselves, we uploaded the map, available under this link: https://imgur.com/a/AOAitzO (Spoiler alert!)

Filip has a lot of experience with making background music, however, it was the first time that he did the sound effects. It was a bit challenging for him, although he nailed it!
